tool_description: Parses grant application guidelines and extracts structured eligibility criteria, evaluation metrics, submission requirements, and scoring rubrics from grant documents.

grant_document_url.description: URL or path to the grant guidelines document

grant_program_name.description: Name of the specific grant program

document_type.description: Type of document: RFP, guidelines, announcement, or application

focus_areas.description: Specific sections to prioritize in parsing

error_messages: Document inaccessible: Unable to access the grant document at the provided URL or path.
Invalid document type: Document type must be one of [RFP, guidelines, announcement, application].
Parsing failed: Document format is not compatible or contains insufficient structured information.
Missing critical sections: Document lacks essential information like eligibility or evaluation criteria.
usage: Provide grant_document_url, grant_program_name, and document_type. Optionally specify focus_areas for targeted parsing. The tool extracts structured criteria and requirements.
